I rarely rate games, but this one deserves it. Not perfect by any stretch of the imagination but it is totally worth getting. It‚Äôs fun and although it does require focus, it doesn‚Äôt require much brainpower, which is great because I usually play games on my phone late at night. The aesthetics are simple but good, and it is very satisfying. It didn‚Äôt originally look like a very good game but when I got it I really started enjoying it. There are very few ads, which I love. Absolutely recommend ‚ù§Ô∏è
